I just didn’t think he would cut it so close!” you explained as you ducked the light debris heading towards you from the Krampus and Carol’s fight.

Carol was doing her best to push the Krampus off of her, but he continued to redouble his efforts against her. “Give my brother back his title!” He picked her up and threw her so that she slammed into the wall. Carol slid down the wall hurt, as the Krampus advanced on her.

Since our magic flows from different sources, we could not affect or be affected by the other.”

“Give my brother back his title!” the Krampus yelled one final time as he drew a claw across Carol’s throat bringing forth a trickle of blood.

The bells signaled midnight. It was Christmas Eve, and Carol’s next words would change everything.

“Just give Nick back his title,” you pleaded to Carol.

“Her father? But…but you’re younger than she is!”

“I only look younger,” he laughed. “My little girl isn’t even 19-years-old!”

“Uh…okay,” the nurse stuttered before leaving. Your father chuckled knowing she was never going to puzzle this one out.

“It doesn’t matter,” you began to cry, “I was so afraid the baby would be a constant reminder of my mistakes, and now he’s not. He’s a constant reminder of our love.”

Santa kissed you and you cried a little. Your father put his arms around your mother and looked on happily. “What’s his name?” he asked.

“His name? That’s easy. His name is Kris Kringle!”

He seemed to adjust better than you did to the whole situation. Nick felt that the reason was your change was more sudden and Kris’s was more gradual giving him more time to come to terms with it.

Kris was 19-years-old when her diminishing manhood became her blossoming womanhood. The transition went very smooth for your son, now daughter. Though her first period was quite the adventure for the two of you.

“Oh! I think I feel a fart coming on,” Victoria http://imgbox.com/JOY7TRwv laughed as she lifted herself up from her chair at the sidewalk bistro and let a little bubbling fart out.

“Oh my God!” Christina http://imgbox.com/mtXM3Fz1 threw her fork down on her plate disgusted with her older sister’s behavior. “Can’t we make it through one, just one, lunch together without you ruining it?” Christina closed her eyes and pinched the bridge of her nose, trying with all her might to stay composed. “I swear Victoria if it wasn’t for James, I-I-I just don’t know if I would have the will to come here anymore! I just don’t!”

“Oh calm down there!” Victoria shot back scrunching up her face with her usual annoyance at her sister’s dramatics. “It was just a tiny fart! You act like I gassed out the whole place! You needed to get over yourself when we were kids, and you need to get over yourself now!” Victoria shot a finger at her little sister.

“James, tell your sister to learn how to behave in public, because I don’t think I have the strength to do it anymore. I think I lost the strength to do so years ago frankly,” Christina told her older brother with all the desperation of a practiced drama queen.

“Oh shut up Victoria, you’ve had your nose so turned up at us for so long I don’t even remember what color your eyes are! Right Jimmy?” Victoria nudged her little brother.

James Thomas sighed and stared straight ahead, trying to tune out the arguing of his sisters, the same thing he did at every weekly get together with them. His ears heard their bickering and attempts to drag him into it become further and further muffled as he questioned, “Why me? Why did I end up with two gold-digging cougars as sisters? Two gold-digging cougar sisters who do nothing but ARGUE?”

For as long as he could remember James older sister, the outrageous tomboy with the body of a porn star, and his little sister, the overly dramatic princess with the body of a high class escort, have fought. About anything, and everything. And they always dragged him into it. Always.

The only thing these two had in common was their love of other people’s money. Being so rude and crude Victoria had landed a rich former frat boy’s hand in marriage. They seemed like a couple just made for each other, helped by the fact that Rhett’s, her husband’s, father owned four car dealerships and made his son vice president right out of college. Victoria’s love of farting and penchant for crude humor made her the perfect wife for the just as obnoxious Rhett.

Christina had landed herself the life she wanted so much as the trophy wife to a high-powered stockbroker. She barely saw her husband, Charles, but saw his money enough to make up for it. Her dramatic prissy ways forced Charles to dote on her, and she rarely left the house without returning with some new outfit or piece of jewelry. Or car.

“I swear, I wish I just had two boys instead of sisters, two sons who just got along,” James thought as he saw his sisters hands both begin to gesture emphatically at each other, all while continuing to yell. “Yeah two sons…with a minute! Didn’t I have two sons? I mean, didn’t I?”

…Two Weeks Earlier…

“Brandon! Brett! Where are you guys?” James called for his sons, wanting them to join him in the family room of their new home.

“Over here dad,” Bandon his 10-year-old called, just barely racing into the room ahead of his younger 8-year-old brother. The two had grown up without many other kids around, and had become best friends as a result. James wanted to find them more friends their own age, other than each other, and that was one of the driving forces for him to move the family to Golden Hills. That and the house just held too many painful memories of Maria. God rest her soul.

But now they were in a new house, and Brandon and Brett were playing as usual. In fact they only argued occasionally and never for long, and they always made up with a hug.

“What do you want daddy?” Brett asked.

“Well daddy is going to paint you two’s room, so he wants you to go out and play. Okay?”

“Sure dad, c’mon Brett,” Brandon smiled as he grabbed his little brother and dragged him outside with him.

Outside the two were playing in the front yard when they saw something shiny on the sidewalk, two something shinies. “What are they?” Brett asked.

“They’re rings,” Brandon told him picking them up and looking at them. Both were very expensive, very diamond encrusted, wedding rings, which must have been worth a small fortune.

“What kind of rings?”

“Super hero rings!” Brandon told his bother handing him a ring. They both put them on and threw their hands in the air in a very heroic pose. And both laughed a little when Brandon accidentally farted.

“And this is why we can never have a real conversation!” Christina snapped back. “You just want to sit there and fart trying to be funny, and you’re not! You never were! And you take no stock on those around you or what their needs. You always put yourself first!” Which was somewhat true. “No wonder you ended up with a common low-class frat boy. It’s the best you could aspire too!”

James sighed; this was not going to end well. “Just like every other lunch,” he mumbled defeated.

“You gold digging bitch!” Victoria yelled as she stood up and slammed her hands on the table.

“If that isn’t the pot calling the kettle black,” Christina turned away dismissively, but not outright denying the accusation.

“Who are you to criticize me and my husband? So we like to have fun with farts, big fucking deal!”

“So crude.”

“When was the last time you had fun with your husband? Do you even remember what he looks like, hmm? Or do you just collect his social security checks? Does he still complain about all that new-fangled technology, and how back in his day the trolley only cost a nickel?” Victoria asked sarcastically as she moved her arms side to side at 90-degree angles mocking her sister’s husband.

“Now you look,” Christina looked her sister dead in the eye and pointed at her, “Charles may be a little bit older than me-!”

“Ha! That’s an understatement!”

“But he loves me, and he makes sure I have everything I need to be happy!”

“Except an active sex life! Bitch you need to get laid!”

The two sexy blondes continued to snipe at each other, and James retreated further into himself, wondering where it all went wrong.

…10 Days Earlier…

James walked in to find his oldest son, Vrandia, crying on the couch. He inwardly cursed, wondering when the boy would start to wear his bra, his breasts were just too big to not need the support. Vrandia had his face buried in his hands as he shook up and down, his light blonde ponytail flopping around everywhere. He was dressed in basketball shorts, which showed off his shapely legs. Ever since he started his senior year of high school he had been so emotional and self-conscious as of late. “What’ the matter pal?” James asked putting an arm around his slender shoulders.

“Daddy, am I ugly?” Vrandia asked, his eyes red and puffy from the tears.

“What, no,” James said truthfully. His son did have beautiful eyes and some thin but very kissable lips. He was definitely very attractive, and James hated to admit it but he did get wolf whistles walking to and from school.

“Do you think Brettina is better looking then me?”

“Your brother? No, I think you’re both beautiful. Why, you’ve never worried that your brother was better looking than you before, what brought this on?”

“If we’re both good looking, then why is she the one getting fucked upstairs right now?” Vrandia sobbed.

“What?” James asked very monotone. His 16-year-old baby girl was upstairs having sex? Right now?

“She brought Dennis home, my Dennis! And I’ve heard them going at it all afternoon! How could she do that to me? How could he?”

James said nothing as he got up and walked up the stairs trembling with rage. Vrandia heard yelling and banging, and finally a loud thud as his sister and the boy he was once going out with started screaming and yelling. He also heard his father yell like he never had before, followed by what he could only assume was Dennis being dragged down the stairs. “If you weren’t still a kid I would break your God Damned neck!” James shouted as he half dragged, half carried the boy to the door. He slammed Dennis into the door and looked at the boy and snarled, “Oops! Sorry about that! Mind getting the door for me?”

Dennis wiped the blood from his nose and opened the door with an almost uncontrollably shaking hand. He looked to Vrandia for help, but was only answered with a flipping of the bird. James was about to literally throw the boy out the door when Brettina came down the stairs holding her shirt over her large naked breasts. Her blonde hair was matted to her face from sweat, and her perfect heart shaped ass was on full display. Vrandia couldn’t help but be jealous of his sister’s thin waist. “Daddy! NO! I love him!”

“You love him?” James turned to his youngest, “You love him? Honey I should have said this a long time ago, but I guess now’s better than never: Stop being such a fucking DRAMA QUEEN! You are 16-God-Damned-year-old! You do not love him! You do not know what love is!” James tossed Dennis out the door and slammed it, shaking the house.

“My life is over,” Brettina wailed as she broke down on the steps, “I’ll never love anyone like him ever again!”

“Get over yourself,” James sneered at his daughter and walked away leaving her stunned. Daddy had never talked that way to his little princess before.

Brettina turned to Vrandia on the couch, who wiped her tears away with a very pleased smile on her face, “This is your fault! I will never forgive you for this!” she yelled. “Never!” she screamed even louder, in a high-pitched shrieking voice.

*SLAP*

“Only if you pull mine,” she smiled back extending her own finger, as she tucked some stray hairs behind her ear.

“No!” James interrupted, “Here she come, so no farting right now, you understand me?” Both nodded their heads, not wanting to put James more on edge. James hugged Chrettina as she ran up, “Congratulations kiddo!”

“Thank you so much James, your being her means the world to me, it truly does,” Chrettina told him as she placed a hand over his heart, and nodded solemnly. She looked at her sister and glared. “Vrandoria. Rhett.”
